description:
At the law firm of Lavelle and Associates in Athens, Ohio, our dedicated and experienced trial attorneys are fully prepared to help you with virtually any legal need you may face.

Serving a diverse range of clients throughout Athens County and the surrounding areas for more than 30 years, our law firm has become the trusted source for high-quality, effective advocacy and counsel, and our attorneys possess the skills and resources to handle your needs regardless of how complex or challenging.

Regarded as one of the top general practice law firms in the region, we offer exceptional legal counsel and advocacy in a number of legal areas, including all of the following:

• Criminal defense for DUI and other criminal offenses
• Personal injury and wrongful death claims resulting from automobile accidents and other preventable tragedies
• Insurance disputes
• Estate planning and probate
• Real estate law and transaction
• General civil litigation

Along with our extensive legal experience, we also hold high ratings from a number of client and peer review sources, and Martindale-Hubbell recognized our founder, John P. Lavelle, as a "Top Rated Lawyer in Litigation" in 2015. This mean that we not only provide the solid legal counsel and support you need, we also do so with the utmost professionalism and integrity, so you can always trust that your case will be in the best hands possible.

To receive a free initial consultation concerning your situation, you can contact Lavelle and Associates by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule an appointment.
